item.title: 便利店运营商 RaceTrac 将以 5.66 亿美元收购三明治连锁店 Potbelly
item.description: RaceTrac 周三同意以约 5.66 亿美元的价格收购三明治连锁店 Potbelly Corp，这是便利店运营商收购餐饮品牌的罕见举动。【原文：RaceTrac agreed to buy sandwich chain Potbelly Corp for approximately $566 million on Wednesday, in a rare move for a convenience store operator to buy out a restaurant brand.】

item.title: 默多克子女欢呼达成和解，结束家族信托纠纷
item.description: 普鲁登斯-麦克劳德（Prudence MacLeod）、伊丽莎白-默多克（Elisabeth Murdoch）和詹姆斯-默多克（James Murdoch）周三发表声明称，他们很高兴就默多克家族信托基金的诉讼达成和解协议。【原文：Prudence MacLeod, Elisabeth Murdoch and James Murdoch issued a statement on Wednesday saying they are happy to have reached an agreement to settle litigation over the Murdoch family trust.】

item.title: Netflix 首席产品官 Eunice Kim 将离职
item.description: 流媒体先锋 Netflix 周三表示，自 2023 年以来一直担任 Netflix 首席产品官的 Eunice Kim 将离开公司。【原文：Eunice Kim, who has been Netflix's chief product officer since 2023, will be leaving the company, the streaming pioneer said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家报道：消息人士称，韩国人在突袭后从更多的 LGES 美国电池基地回家
item.description: 上周，LG Energy Solution 与现代汽车（Hyundai Motor）的合资工厂遭到移民局突袭，两名熟悉情况的人士表示，由于签证问题，一些韩国工人正从 LG Energy Solution 在美国的更多生产基地成群结队地离开。【原文：Some South Korean workers are decamping in droves from more of LG Energy Solution's U.S. production sites because of visa concerns following last week's immigration raid on its joint facility with Hyundai Motor , said two people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 波音防务公司与工会达成结束圣路易斯地区罢工的临时协议
item.description: 波音公司国防部和机械工人工会周三宣布，双方已达成临时协议，结束在圣路易斯地区长达五周的罢工。【原文：Boeing Defense and the machinists union have reached a tentative deal to end a five-week-long strike in the St. Louis area, union officials announced on Wednesday.】

item.title: 拉克兰-默多克在和解后的首次发言中称信托协议对投资者大有裨益
item.description: 福克斯公司首席执行官拉克兰-默多克（Lachlan Murdoch）周三在协议签署后的首次公开讲话中表示，默多克家族信托基金的和解对 "投资者来说是个好消息"，将使公司的战略更加清晰和具有连续性。【原文：Fox Corp CEO Lachlan Murdoch said on Wednesday the settlement over the Murdoch Family Trust is "great news for investors" and will provide clarity and continuity to the company's strategy, in his first public remarks since the agreement.】

item.title: 派拉蒙任命 Meta 高管 Dane Glasgow 为首席产品官
item.description: 派拉蒙公司周三表示，Meta 公司高管戴恩-格拉斯哥（Dane Glasgow）将加入媒体公司，担任首席产品官。【原文：Paramount said on Wednesday that Meta executive Dane Glasgow will join the media company as its chief product officer.】

item.title: Cigna 称，承保减肥药物的雇主比例持平
item.description: Cigna 公司周三表示，为肥胖症药物买单的雇主比例同比持平，但该医疗保险公司仍认为对这种广受欢迎的治疗方法的需求在上升。【原文：Cigna said on Wednesday the percentage of employers paying for obesity drugs has remained flat year-over-year, though the health insurer still sees an uptick in demand for the wildly popular treatments.】

item.title: Coupang 赢得美国股东有关 IPO 的诉讼撤诉
item.description: 美国法官周三驳回了一起指控 Coupang（一家有时被称为韩国亚马逊的电子商务公司）在 2021 年首次公开募股期间和之后欺诈股东的诉讼。【原文：A U.S. judge on Wednesday dismissed a lawsuit accusing Coupang , an e-commerce company sometimes referred to as the Amazon of South Korea, of defrauding shareholders during and after its 2021 initial public offering.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：OpenAI 与甲骨文签署 3000 亿美元计算协议
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三报道，OpenAI 已与甲骨文公司签署了一份合同，将在大约五年内购买 3000 亿美元的计算能力，这也是历史上最大的一笔交易。【原文：OpenAI has signed a contract to purchase $300 billion in computing power over roughly five years from Oracle , among biggest in history, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国参议员怀登推动美国联邦贸易委员会调查微软 "严重的网络安全过失
item.description: 美国民主党参议员罗恩-怀登（Ron Wyden）周三要求联邦贸易委员会 "调查并追究 "微软在近年来一连串备受瞩目的网络安全事件中所扮演的角色，称该公司的安全方法 "继续威胁着美国的国家安全"。【原文：U.S. Democratic Senator Ron Wyden on Wednesday requested the Federal Trade Commission “investigate and hold Microsoft responsible” for its role in a string of high-profile cybersecurity incidents in recent years, saying the company’s approach to security “continues to threaten U.S. national security.”】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会就非竞争性惯例向医疗雇主和人才派遣公司发出警告
item.description: 联邦贸易委员会主席安德鲁-弗格森（Andrew Ferguson）在周三的一份声明中说，该监管机构致函几家大型医疗保健雇主和人才派遣公司，要求他们对包括非竞争限制在内的雇佣协议进行全面审查。【原文：Federal Trade Commission Chairman Andrew Ferguson sent letters to several large healthcare employers and staffing companies to conduct a comprehensive review of their employment agreements including non-compete restrictions, the regulator said in a statement on Wednesday.】

item.title: 伦敦金银业贸易协会称白宫更新金条关税是 "可喜的进展
item.description: 伦敦金银市场协会（London Bullion Market Association）周三表示，在最近美国海关对金条的裁决引发挑战之后，白宫对其关税计划的更新是一个 "值得欢迎的发展"。【原文：The White House update to its tariff schedule is a "welcome development" after challenges caused by a recent U.S. Customs ruling on gold bars, the London Bullion Market Association said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 欧盟与美国在俄罗斯向印度出售石油问题上的政策分歧将打击 10 月份的贸易
item.description: 了解装载计划的分析师和贸易消息人士称，美国和欧盟在俄罗斯向印度出口石油问题上日益加剧的政策分歧很可能会导致 10 月份原油流量的小幅减少。【原文：The growing policy divide between the United States and the European Union on Russian oil exports to India is likely to play out in a small reduction in crude flows in October, analysts and trade sources with knowledge of loading plans said.】

item.title: 墨西哥将对中国汽车征收的关税提高至 50
item.description: 墨西哥经济部长马塞洛-埃布拉德（Marcelo Ebrard）周三表示，墨西哥将把对来自中国和其他亚洲国家的汽车征收的关税从之前的 20% 提高到 50%。【原文：Mexico will raise its tariffs on automobiles from China and other Asian countries to 50%, from a prior level of 20%, Economy Minister Marcelo Ebrard said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Coach 母公司 Tapestry 预计到 2028 年抵消关税成本，计划回购 30 亿美元
item.description: Tapestry 公司高管在周三举行的投资者日上表示，预计到 2028 财年将完全缓解当前美国关税的影响，该零售商宣布计划在此期间回购价值 30 亿美元的股票。【原文：Tapestry expects to fully mitigate the impact of current U.S. tariffs by fiscal year 2028, executives said at its investor day on Wednesday, as the retailer announced plans to buy back shares worth $3 billion during that period.】

item.title: 日本 JERA 公司与阿拉斯加价值 440 亿美元的出口项目签订液化天然气承购协议
item.description: 能源开发商格兰法恩（Glenfarne）将在 20 年内每年向日本最大的发电商 JERA 供应一百万吨液化天然气，这为耗资 440 亿美元、因成本高昂而备受质疑的阿拉斯加液化天然气项目预支了一笔资金。【原文：Energy developer Glenfarne will supply Japan’s biggest power generator, JERA, with one million metric tons of LNG annually for 20 years, an advance for the $44 billion Alaska LNG project that has attracted doubts because of its high costs.】

item.title: 晨星表示，美国关税和定价风险对大型制药公司而言是可控的
item.description: 据券商晨星公司（Morningstar）分析，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普计划对药品征收进口关税并推动降低药品价格，这对美国和欧洲大型制药商的影响可能是可控的。【原文：The impact of U.S. President Donald Trump's plan to levy import duties on pharmaceutical products and his push to lower drug prices are likely to be manageable for big U.S. and European drugmakers, according to an analysis by brokerage Morningstar.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，ADNOC 接近敲定欧盟对 Covestro 交易的补救措施
item.description: 阿布扎比国有石油巨头 ADNOC 正在准备补救措施，以应对欧盟对其 147 亿欧元（172 亿美元）竞购德国科思创公司（Covestro）的补贴调查。【原文：Abu Dhabi state oil giant ADNOC is readying remedies to address an EU subsidy investigation into its 14.7 billion euro ($17.2 billion) bid for Germany's Covestro that will likely see it convert a proposed 1.2 billion euro capital hike to a shareholder loan, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 美国法院倾向于驳回黄金储备公司要求取消 Elliott 竞购 Citgo 母公司资格的动议
item.description: 特拉华州法官伦纳德-斯塔克（Leonard Stark）在周三的一份文件中表示，特拉华州法院倾向于驳回矿商 Gold Reserve 最近提出的一项动议，即取消对冲基金 Elliott Investment Management 关联公司对 Citgo Petroleum 母公司的竞购资格。【原文：A Delaware court is inclined to deny a motion recently introduced by miner Gold Reserve to disqualify a rival bid from an affiliate of hedge fund Elliott Investment Management for the parent of Citgo Petroleum, Judge Leonard Stark said in a filing on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特朗普政府对阻止解除美联储理事库克职务的裁决提出上诉
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的政府周三迅速采取行动，对联邦法官暂时阻止特朗普采取史无前例的措施解雇美联储理事丽莎-库克（Lisa Cook）的裁决提出上诉。【原文：President Donald Trump's administration on Wednesday moved quickly to appeal a federal judge's ruling temporarily blocking Trump from taking the unprecedented step of firing Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook.】

item.title: Bumble传记片《Swiped》挑战硅谷 "男孩俱乐部
item.description: 由英国演员莉莉-詹姆斯（Lily James）饰演约会应用 Bumble 创始人惠特尼-沃尔夫-赫德（Whitney Wolfe Herd）的新传记片《Swiped》，将观众带回了 2010 年代初的硅谷，那时左右滑动还与相亲没有任何关系。【原文：The new biopic "Swiped," starring British actor Lily James as dating app Bumble founder Whitney Wolfe Herd, takes the audience back to Silicon Valley in the early 2010s, before swiping left or right had anything to do with match-making.】

item.title: 默克将撤销伦敦药物研究中心
item.description: 默克公司周三表示，将取消在伦敦的研究业务，理由是英国的商业环境充满挑战。【原文：Merck said on Wednesday it was scrapping research operations in London, citing the UK's challenging business environment.】

item.title: 人工智能软件开发商 Replit 以 30 亿美元估值融资 2.5 亿美元
item.description: 随着投资者继续支持人工智能初创企业，人工智能软件开发平台 Replit 周三表示，它已在一轮融资中筹集了 2.5 亿美元，该公司总部位于旧金山，估值达 30 亿美元。【原文：AI software developer platform Replit on Wednesday said it has raised $250 million in a funding round that values the San Francisco-based company at $3 billion, as investors continue to back AI startups.】

item.title: 巴里克公司高管在黄金争端中改换门庭，为马里总统出谋划策
item.description: 一位矿业部官员周三告诉路透社，在与马里政府的紧张谈判中代表巴里克矿业公司的一位高级管理人员已改换门庭，成为马里总统的顾问。【原文：A senior Barrick Mining executive who had been representing the company in tense negotiations with Mali's government has switched sides to become an adviser to Mali's president, a mines ministry official told Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 因债务问题，Kering 将华伦天奴的全面收购推迟至 2028 年
item.description: Kering 周三表示，至少要到 2028 年才会完全收购意大利时尚品牌华伦天奴（Valentino），这是 Kering 在新任首席执行官 Luca de Meo 领导下采取的第一个重大举措。【原文：Kering said on Wednesday that it will not fully buy Italian fashion brand Valentino until at least 2028, its first major move under new CEO Luca de Meo, pushing back the execution of an expensive deal that has been weighing on the heavily indebted group.】

item.title: 甲骨文因人工智能云计算收益而暴涨，埃里森逼近马斯克成为世界首富
item.description: 甲骨文公司周三股价大涨约43%，创下历史新高，有望加入万亿美元精英俱乐部，此前该公司展示了其作为主要人工智能云提供商的崛起。【原文：Oracle shares surged about 43% to a record high on Wednesday, putting the company on track to join the elite trillion‑dollar club, after it showcased its rise as a major AI cloud provider.】

item.title: IIF 称，新兴市场投资组合 8 月份流入近 450 亿美元，但裂缝正在显现
item.description: 据一家银行业贸易集团的报告称，8 月份投资者向新兴市场股票和债券投资组合投入了近 450 亿美元，创下近一年来的最高纪录，但中国以外的新兴市场股票出现大量资金外流，表明投资者的情绪发生了变化。【原文：Investors plowed nearly $45 billion into their emerging market equities and debt portfolios in August, the most in nearly a year, but a large outflow from EM stocks outside of China pointed to a change of sentiment among investors, according to a report from a banking trade group.】

item.title: 劳工部监察长审查对 BLS 经济数据收集工作的质疑
item.description: 美国劳工部总监察长办公室周三表示，继近期大幅下调非农就业数据和削减通胀数据收集后，该办公室正着手审查美国劳工统计局（BLS）在收集和报告美国经济数据方面所面临的挑战。【原文：The office of the Labor Department's inspector general said on Wednesday it was initiating a review of challenges the Bureau of Labor Statistics (BLS) faces in collecting and reporting U.S. economic data following recent large downward revisions to nonfarm payrolls and cuts to inflation data collection.】

item.title: 詹姆斯-莫洛尼被任命为美国证券交易委员会公司金融部主任
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission）在周三的一份声明中表示，该机构已任命长期从事公司证券业务的律师、前美国证券交易委员会官员詹姆斯-莫洛尼（James Moloney）领导其公司金融部门。【原文：James Moloney, a long-time corporate securities lawyer and former official at the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, has been tapped to lead its corporation finance division, the agency said in a statement on Wednesday.】
